error.username-invalid-length: The username must be greater than 5 characters and less than 20 characters.
error.password-game-invalid-length: The password must be greater than 5 characters and less than 30 characters.

finaly-create-account-game.title-server-message: Protect your account and choose a secure password for the game.
finaly-create-account-game.loading-sniper-txt: We are creating your account, please hold on for a moment

account-game.title-server-message: Choose a username that represents you and shines in our community! This will be your personal mark in the game.

congrats.body-welcome: We warmly welcome you to our community! We're delighted to have you here. You're just one step away from enjoying your favorite games for free. Finish creating your game account and start playing now!
congrats.disclaimer: We guarantee the complete security of your data, and you retain full control over your information. If you decide to unsubscribe at any time, we will completely delete all your data from our system.

register.title-server-message: All the information you share with us at Wow Libre is like the special ingredient of your amazing experience! The more we know, the better we can make you experience something truly extraordinary. So, share those details with us and get ready for something out of this world!

kown-you.title-server-message: Your real name may be used in the future to verify your identity when contacting WowLibre. By default, your real name will remain hidden from other users.

contact-means.title-server-message: This is what you'll use when logging into websites and mobile apps.

terms-and-conditions.title-server-message: Welcome to Wow Libre! Accepting our options allows you to immerse yourself in a personalized experience full of exclusive offers, exciting news, and much more.

input.email-check-text: The account email will receive special offers, news, and more from Wow Libre
input.term-check-text: I have read and accept the following: Terms and Conditions

account-web.title-server-message: Protect your account and choose a secure password for the administrative web.

error.empty-field-message: Please fill in all required fields to continue
error.authentication-message: The data is invalid, please check your information

errors.special-characters: Please avoid entering special characters in the search.

service-unavailable.message: It is not possible to obtain the details of your accounts at this time, please wait.

service-available.txt-message: Manage and administer World of Warcraft accounts efficiently and securely.

confirm-mail.title: Please confirm your email address.
confirm-mail.description: We haven't received confirmation of your email. Check your inbox, and if you can't find the message, you can resend it using the Validate Email button.

message.expiration-session: Oops! Your session has expired. Please authenticate again to continue.

bank.title: Master Azeroth with an Exclusive Gold Loan!
bank.description: Elevate your adventure in Azeroth to an epic level with our Gold Loan. Get the financing you need to enhance your gear, expand your treasure collection, or simply enjoy the best in-game experiences to the fullest.

benefits.primary: Apply for your loan and receive your money today.

bank.disclaimer: Loans have interest. Check the 'Loan Guide' section for more details.

primary.title: Payment Notifications
primary.description: You will receive in-game notifications to remind you when your loan is due.

secondary.title: Grace Period
secondary.description: If you don't pay on time, you will have a 15-day grace period to catch up before penalties are applied.

tertiary.title: Consequences of Default
tertiary.description: If you fail to pay, the system will automatically deduct the owed gold from your accounts. If there isn't enough gold, in-game items of equivalent value will be deducted.

loan_guide.title: Loan Guide
loan_guide.complementary_subtitle: Choose the one that best suits your needs

secondary.title: Choose the Ideal Plan for You
secondary.description: Select the perfect plan that fits your needs and enhances your experience.

tertiary.title: Your Gold Package is on its Way!
tertiary.description: In a few minutes, check your in-game mail to receive your valuable package.

quaternary.title: Remember Timely Payment!
quaternary.description: Enjoy the newly arrived gold in your game, but don't forget the payment due date.

plans.title: Discover Our Plans!
plans.subtitle: Clear prices tailored to your needs. Total transparency so you can choose the best for your account!

testimony.title: Hello! üëã
testimony.primary_paragraph: In a distant region of Azeroth, there was once an adventurer named Fizzle who, tempted by an offer of easy gold, decided to take out a loan without thinking twice. Although the gold promised to improve his gear and fill his coffers with treasures, he soon discovered that debts and unfulfilled promises became an overwhelming burden.
testimony.secondary_paragraph: Fizzle learned the hard way: sometimes, greed can lead us down dark paths. Instead of accepting the gold without considering the consequences, it's better to carefully evaluate our options and choose paths that don't lead to despair.
testimony.tertiary_paragraph: So, before making a decision, think it over. Gold may shine, but freedom and peace of mind are far more valuable.

bank_characters.title: Character Selection
bank_characters.description: Choose the character to request the loan. If some characters don't appear, it's because they don't meet the loan requirements.
bank_characters.success-loan: Haha, you've got your gold! But remember, my friend, this deal fills my pockets too. Don't forget your payments, or the interest will make me smile even more!

errors.fails_to_obtain_accounts: Oops! We're having trouble fetching your accounts. Please try again later!
errors.fails_to_obtain_characters: Oops! We're having trouble fetching your characters. Please try again later!

availability.title: Forge Your Legend: Explore the Guilds of Azeroth
availability.description: Discover a world of camaraderie and epic adventures. Find your perfect community among the legendary guilds of World of Warcraft, where friendship and strategy unite to challenge the boundaries of Azeroth.

no-availability.title: No guilds found!
no-availability.description: Be part of the adventure and leave your mark in Azeroth! Create your own guild and gather other heroes to face epic challenges and conquer new horizons. Don‚Äôt wait any longer, your legacy is waiting for you!

incentive.title: Benefits of Belonging to a Guild
incentive.description: Joining a community of players in an MMORPG offers a unique and enriching experience. It allows you to connect with other passionate players, collaborate on exciting challenges, and access exclusive resources that will enhance your gaming experience.

competition.title: Compete with Other Guilds
competition.description: Participate in competitions so your guild can earn exclusive benefits for its members.

events.title: Events of the
events.description: Prizes obtained will be awarded to all guild members during the event. After this period, the challenges will be updated and must be completed again to acquire the benefits.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.subtitle: Obtained
benefits.disclaimer: By joining this guild, you can obtain the following benefits:
benefits.no-benefits: This guild has no benefits yet

primary.title: Global Event: Resilience in the Capitalist Era
primary.description: Guild leaders hold the power to transform the wealth of their members into unique prizes and exclusive benefits. Join the resistance and help your guild conquer new horizons in this global challenge.

secondary.title: Guild Rewards
secondary.description: Every reward earned by the guild opens the door to exclusive benefits for all its members. Participate and make sure each victory is yours too!

errors.failed-characters-fetch: Unable to retrieve characters from the selected account.

guild-characters.title: Character Selection
guild-characters.description: Choose the character you want to link to the guild

home-servers.title: Allied Servers
home-servers.description: Looking for a unique gaming experience? Join our partnered WoW servers and immerse yourself in fascinating worlds and epic adventures, completely free!
home-servers.empty-server-list-subtitle: Currently, there are no services available, but our brave professionals are perfecting their skills to offer you the best experiences.

friend.title: ‚öîÔ∏è Choose Your Hero! ‚öîÔ∏è
friend.subtitle: In Azeroth, true strength lies in friendship. Add your allies and embark on epic adventures!
friend.text: Together, you‚Äôll face challenges and celebrate victories. Friendship is the most powerful magic of all!

mails.title: ‚öîÔ∏è Choose Your Hero! ‚öîÔ∏è
mails.subtitle: Communication is key in the world of Warcraft. Send letters and messages to your friends and allies!
mails.text: Share your adventures, strategies, and secrets. Every word matters in the battle for Azeroth's destiny!

professions.title: ‚öîÔ∏è Choose Your Hero! ‚öîÔ∏è
professions.subtitle: Become a master blacksmith, alchemist, or even an enchanting sage! The possibilities are endless... choose your path within the game!
professions.text: The key to power is in your hands. Professions will take you to the next level!

guilds.title: ‚öîÔ∏è Choose Your Hero! ‚öîÔ∏è
guilds.subtitle: Azeroth's strength lies in unity. Join a powerful guild and fight alongside your friends!
guilds.text: Together, you can conquer great challenges and forge an eternal legacy. The adventure starts here!

premium.title: ‚öîÔ∏è Choose Your Champion! ‚öîÔ∏è
premium.subtitle: Make the most of your subscription privileges
premium.text: Unlock your hero's full potential with exclusive benefits. Make every battle count!

promotions.title: ‚öîÔ∏è Forge Your Destiny! ‚öîÔ∏è
promotions.subtitle: Take advantage of legendary offers
promotions.text: Unlock epic promotions and enhance your adventure. Don't miss this opportunity!

errors.fetch-invalid-character: Character information couldn't be retrieved. Please try again later.

support.title: Support Service
support.subtitle: Explore our commitment to delivering exceptional quality support.

team.title: An Experienced and Passionate Team at Your Service
team.subtitle: Top experts in their field, ready for every challenge.

section-one.title: Reset Your Password
section-one.sub-title: Regain access to your account and continue your epic adventure in Azeroth. Complete the form below to reset your password and reclaim your heroic status in World of Warcraft.
section-one.success-message: Email sent. Please check your inbox and use the code within the next 3 minutes.
section-one.error-send-message: Error sending the email. Please try again.

section-two.title: Verify Your Security Code
section-two.sub-title: Enter the security code we‚Äôve just sent to your email to verify your identity.
section-two.disclaimer: Reminder: The security code is only valid for 3 minutes.
section-two.success-message: We have sent a temporary password to your email. Use it to access your account and be sure to update it to a secure password once you're logged in.

home-products.title: Incredible Offers
home-products.subtitle: Don‚Äôt miss out on the most irresistible promotions just for you! Take advantage now!

offer-day.title: Exclusive Offer of the Day!
offer-day.disclaimer: Discover the most amazing promotions only for today!

home-information-beta.title: Welcome to Wow Libre!
home-information-beta.description: Our platform is currently in its beta phase. This means you might come across some features or details still under development. We appreciate your understanding and support as we continue to improve.

push-deploy.title: Push to deploy.
push-deploy.description: You may notice changes on the platform due to ongoing updates we are developing.

certificates.title: SSL certificates.
certificates.description: We have SSL security certificates to ensure the protection of your information.

database.title: Database backups.
database.description: All information provided will be safe with regular backups, and accounts will not be deleted.

home-information-beta.congrats: We greatly appreciate any bug reports you may find on our platform. Your help allows us to improve so you can fully enjoy the game content!

notice.title: Will my characters be deleted? Don't worry!
notice.description: During the beta phase, your data will be safe. No account or character will be deleted!

home-us.title: WoW Libre Community
home-us.description: In the digital world of World of Warcraft, community-generated data is an invaluable resource. At WoW Libre, we transform this wealth into an accessible resource, enabling other servers to integrate and share information. We act as an open bridge for data exchange, fostering collaboration and enhancing the gaming experience. In Azeroth, true power lies in the community and its ability to share and expand knowledge. Join us and be part of this collective adventure!

errors.friend-is-empty-description: It seems you haven't added any friends to your list yet. Connect with other adventurers to start building your in-game social network.

empty.subtitle: You haven't learned any professions yet. Dive into the world of World of Warcraft and discover countless professions to enhance your gaming experience! Become a master artisan, an expert herbalist, or an innovative engineer. The possibilities are endless!
